title: Refresh button, equalizer, and search
text: Could use a refresh buttton if non of the recommended videos you see on your timeline are of any particular interest to you. Additionally, the music app could use an equalizer option and crossfade option too, as well as an option to search for a specific song within a playlist, rather than the search sampling the entire app. Just some minor suggestions. Otherwise, both apps are good

title: Commercials
text: There are way too many commercials now on YouTube. Every minute and a half at the start of some videos. That‚Äôs more than network television. Let‚Äôs cut back a bit of the commercial breaks. People started watching YouTube because there were no to a few commercials without having to PAY for it.

title: Newest YouTube version hardly works w/ too many ads
text:
I‚Äôve used YouTube for over a decade and never seen it this terrible, at least for the app. It takes sometimes multiple minutes to play a video (yes I have good service and full WiFi), no matter where I am, the layout seems to be getting worse and worse, and the algorithm makes it increasingly difficult to find content I enjoy.

Hope they get it together soon and YT.
